name: OkZoomer
description:
Made for the April 2021 PB & Jam event.

Developers:

  • Kyle Claudio
  • Ryan Cherry
  • Alex Anstiss
  • Andrew Bieleski

Controls:

  • A/D to move left and right
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Scroll the mouse wheel to change your size

Avoid staying in the purple mist for too long, or you'll die!
